import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Row, Container, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import data from "../../data/Trip.json"; import NavbarComp from "../../components/navbar/NavbarComp"; import "./styledet.css"; import res from "../../assets/icons/resort.png"; import air from "../../assets/icons/airplane.png"; import eat from "../../assets/icons/eating.png"; import calend from "../../assets/icons/calendar.png"; import bg1 from "../../assets/images/j3.png"; function DetailPage({ match }) { const [detail, setDetail] = useState({}); const { id } = match.params; useEffect(() => { let idd = id - 1; setDetail(data[idd]); }, []); return ( <>

{detail.day}D/{detail.night}N {detail.title}

{detail?.country}

{/* =============================== */} {detail?.img?.map((items, idx) => ( ))}

Information Trip
Acomodation

Hotel {detail.night} Night

Transpotasion

{detail.transpotation}

{detail.eat}

Duration

{detail.day}Day/{detail.night}Night

Date Trip

{detail.date}

Total : {detail.price} / Person

IDR.{detail.price}


); } export default DetailPage;
